title: Childhood Stories of George Washington
description: This is a illustrated collection of famous stories about the first U.S. president, George Washington. Each story includes examples of how George Washington was an honest person, even as a child.
reviewWords: bucked, harshly, hatchet, honest, president, tumbled
comprehension: Cause and Effect                : Cause and effect
awareness: Initial and Final Blends : Discriminate initial and final consonant st-blends
phonics: Consonant Blends : Identify initial and final consonant st-blends
grammar: Periods                : Place periods in the correct location within a story
